snippet.title: Townsmen - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Official game trailer of 'Townsmen' by http://www.handy-games.com. ▶ From humble backwater to medieval metropolis - build the city of YOUR dreams! Get the game here: http://www.handy-games.com/games/townsmen/
________________________________________

Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments and lush gardens. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy!
Pick the best strategy to solve the quests and prove YOU are the one true king!

Townsmen is a classic build up strategy game. Build a lot of different building in real time. You don't have to wait days to finish a building. Care for enough resources and become the greatest king of your Empire. It is the Age of real strategy games. Get it now! 
________________________________________

#HandyGames #Townsmen #CityBuilder #Medieval
Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Townsmen7
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/handygames
Check news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/handy_games
Stay tuned on Google+: http://goo.gl/qkjngm
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY
